Class AuthenticationController

extends java.lang.Object
    A class that handles authentication and sign in methods

    • Method Detail

      • makeLoginRequest

        public void makeLoginRequest(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             AuthCallback authCallback)
        Makes a request for user login. Mandatory callback to return changes to main thread.
        Parameters:
        email - The email passed from the login fragment
        password - The password passed from the login fragment
        authCallback - A callback function to execute on success or failure

      • makeSignUpRequest

        public void makeSignUpRequest(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              AuthCallback authCallback)
        Makes a request to sign a user up. Fails on certain conditions such as the user already has an account and request sign up. More details can be found https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/js/firebase.auth.Auth#createuserwithemailandpassword This needs to be run in executor because getting the user is synchronous.
        Parameters:
        username - The username entered by the user
        email - The email entered by the user
        password - The password entered by the user

      • resetPassword

        public void resetPassword(java.lang.String email,
                          AuthNoResultCallback authCallback)
        Sends a request to update a user's password
        Parameters:
        email - email to update
        authCallback - callback function to execute success or failure

      • changeEmail

        public void changeEmail(User user,
                        AuthNoResultCallback authResult)
        Changes the users email address in firebase auth If successful, persists the change to firestore If unsuccessful, neither operation will happen
        Parameters:
        user - The modified user information

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(User user)
        Updates the user
        Parameters:
        user - User object to be updated

      • signOut

        public void signOut()
        Signs out of the app
